name: 胡憲倫
objective: This course is regarding win-win strategies for which corporate can achieve both profitability and sustainability. Students will not just learn traditional business management but also new strategies and practices for doing business in the emerging green and low carbon economy. Students will be taught the characteristics and landscape of the new economy, and how to help enterprises enhance their competitiveness in response to the megatrends of sustainability. In addition, the latest practices and theories of corporate sustainability, such as UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP), and Creating Shared Values (CSV), will be taught in the class. Case studies and group discussions will be adopted in the class.
